titles: The holie historie of King Dauid wherein is chieflye learned these godly and whosome lessons, that is: to haue sure patience in persecution, due obedience to our prince without rebellion: and also the true and most faithfull dealings of friendes. Drawne into English meetre for the youth to reade; by Iohn Marbeck.
author: Merbecke, John, ca. 1510-ca. 1585.
publisher: Printed by Henrie Middleton, for Iohn Harison,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: David, --  King of Israel --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
